column1: Smoque BBQ////Expect to wait in a long line (ours took about an hour...no exaggeration.  We were hot and grumpy as hell but once we had the food...everything was right with the world.)  I think you can order ahead of time for carry out and skip the line completely.  The prices are VERY reasonable because you get a lot of food for the money. we spent about 25 dollars for both of our brisket meals plus 3 or 4 sides each PLUS dessert and a soda. It was insane.  The place gets pretty packed so you end up in tight quarters with other diners
column2: but its ok cause you're all sharing in the same mind blowing food experience.  I think the guy sitting next to us summed it up best when he said:
